name: BST Chain
description: BST Coins will serve as utility tokens for both large public and private sectors with a particular focus on gemstone industries, Web-3 Industries, The Metaverse, Real- World Asset Tokenization (RWA), Smart City projects, Global Smart education system. The Smart City movement is gaining worldwide traction with countries like India, leading the charge with ambitious plans for Smart governance and City Services, E-Payments are a critical component of these initiatives.
